languages.text: Убедил{mf||а} маршала встать на свою сторону, воззвав к верности Лекс Империалис.
Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his loyalty to the Lex Imperialis.
languages.original_text: Убедил{mf||а} маршала встать на свою сторону, воззвав к верности Лекс Империалис.

traits.locale_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his loyalty to the Lex Imperialis.

languages.text: Has convencido al Mariscal de que se una a tu bando apelando a su lealtad a la Lex Imperialis.
languages.original_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his loyalty to the Lex Imperialis.

traits.locale_text: Has convencido al Mariscal de que se una a tu bando apelando a su lealtad a la Lex Imperialis.

languages.text: 你呼吁元帅忠于帝国法典，说服了他加入你的阵营。
languages.original_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his loyalty to the Lex Imperialis.

traits.locale_text: 你呼吁元帅忠于帝国法典，说服了他加入你的阵营。

languages.text: 将帥を味方に引き込むためにレックス・インペリアへの忠誠心に訴えた。
languages.original_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his loyalty to the Lex Imperialis.

traits.locale_text: 将帥を味方に引き込むためにレックス・インペリアへの忠誠心に訴えた。

languages.text: Den Marschall durch Appellieren an seine Loyalität gegenüber dem Lex Imperia überzeugt, sich auf deine Seite zu schlagen.
languages.original_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his loyalty to the Lex Imperialis.

traits.locale_text: Den Marschall durch Appellieren an seine Loyalität gegenüber dem Lex Imperia überzeugt, sich auf deine Seite zu schlagen.

languages.text: Lex İmperialis'e olan sadakatini kullanarak Miralay'ı kendi tarafına geçmeye ikna ettin.
languages.original_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his loyalty to the Lex Imperialis.

traits.locale_text: Lex İmperialis'e olan sadakatini kullanarak Miralay'ı kendi tarafına geçmeye ikna ettin.

languages.text: Vous avez convaincu le maréchal de se rallier à vous en appelant à sa fidélité envers la Lex Imperialis.
languages.original_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his loyalty to the Lex Imperialis.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez convaincu le maréchal de se rallier à vous en appelant à sa fidélité envers la Lex Imperialis.
